unnormalised: **Ed-Tech Buzz: Finding that Perfect Scholarship Just Got Easier!**
normalised: **Ed-Tech Buzz: Finding that Perfect Scholarship Just Got Easier!**

unnormalised: Forget endless chai breaks spent scouring notice boards at Delhi University! Scholarship portals are totally trending, making finding funding for your education a breeze. Think of them as a Shaadi.com, but for scholarships! Sites like Buddy4Study and Vidyadhan are helping students across India, from Guwahati to Gujarat, connect with thousands of opportunities.
normalised: Forget endless chai breaks spent scouring notice boards at Delhi University! Scholarship portals are totally trending, making finding funding for your education a breeze. Think of them as a Shaadi dot com, but for scholarships! Sites like Buddy4Study and Vidyadhan are helping students across India, from Guwahati to Gujarat, connect with thousands of opportunities.

unnormalised: These portals offer everything from merit-based to need-based scholarships, even those super specific ones for Kathak dancers or aspiring coders from remote villages. Many portals even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile! No more FOMO wondering if you missed that deadline.
normalised: These portals offer everything from merit-based to need-based scholarships, even those super specific ones for Kathak dancers or aspiring coders from remote villages. Many portals even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile! No more F O M O wondering if you missed that deadline.

unnormalised: Got a Bhai or Behen heading to IIT? Tell them to check these out! Plus, many portals offer application support and tips. Seriously, it’s a game changer. Applications often open months in advance, so start browsing now! Check them out before the 31/12/2023 deadline for many programmes. Some deadlines are even earlier – as soon as 10:00 hrs on 15/10/2023! Don't miss out on your chance to grab that coveted Rs. 50,000 scholarship. Remember to also check the fine print and eligibility criteria before 01/01/2024. Happy scholarship hunting!
normalised: Got a Bhai or Behen heading to I I T? Tell them to check these out! Plus, many portals offer application support and tips. Seriously, it’s a game changer. Applications often open months in advance, so start browsing now! Check them out before the thirty first december two thousand and twenty three deadline for many programmes. Some deadlines are even earlier – as soon as ten zero zero hours on fifteenth october two thousand and twenty three! Don't miss out on your chance to grab that coveted rupee fifty thousand scholarship. Remember to also check the fine print and eligibility criteria before the first january two thousand and twenty four. Happy scholarship hunting!
